name: Duros's Doings
description: this pack allows: --Chemicals and medicines to be broken down into basic compound chemicals, these can then be turned back into other more useful chemicals and medicines as long as you have the proper knowledge----*Air Drop* type system to the game, allowing those with access to a flare gun the ability to signal cargo planes to *air drop* a crate in, just craft the required air drop using the flare gun, de-construct the acquired crate and there you have it, items ranging from food drops to military hardware.
author: Richard
